code: import React,{useContext}from'react';import{Link,useParams}from'react-router-dom';import{CartContext}from'../utils/cartContext';import{productsArray}from'../utils/productStore';import'../styles/Product.css';import AddIcon from'@mui/icons-material/Add';import RemoveIcon from'@mui/icons-material/Remove';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";var Product=function Product(){var _useContext=useContext(CartContext),addOneToCart=_useContext.addOneToCart,minusOneFromCart=_useContext.minusOneFromCart;var _useParams=useParams(),id=_useParams.id;var product=productsArray[id];return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"product",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"leftSide",style:{backgroundImage:"url(".concat(product.image,")")}}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"rightSide",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{children:product.title}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:product.description}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:["$",product.price]}),product.quantity>0?/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"quanity-button",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:function onClick(){return addOneToCart(product.id);},children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(AddIcon,{})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:function onClick(){return minusOneFromCart(product.id);},children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(RemoveIcon,{})})]}):/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:function onClick(){return addOneToCart(product.id);},children:"Add To Cart"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"quantity",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:["Quantity: ",product.quantity]})})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"link",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/menu",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{children:" Return to Menu "})})})]});};export default Product;
